Actions.Name: Cut Through
Actions.Effects: The Cutter Demon may teleport to any point on the line after this ability resolves.

Actions.Name: Hunt
Actions.Description: The Cutter Demon marks a foe in range 5.
Actions.Mark: While marked, the demon deals bonus damage, gains +1 boon on attack rolls against that foe, and may teleport 1 every time that foe takes an action. A marked foe can save against this mark at the end of their turns, ending it on a success.
